list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a slit made in a garment to receive a button for fastening.
attract the attention of and detain (someone) in conversation, typically against his or her will.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: reporters buttonhole officials coming out of the press secretary's office
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Các phóng viên các quan chức của Buttonhole ra khỏi văn phòng thư ký báo chí

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: make slits for receiving buttons in (a garment).
